Question: How has the average carbon monoxide (CO) level changed yearly in Phoenix?
Task: Filter the dataset for Phoenix and plot the yearly average of CO Mean values.
Air Quality Map by State

```{r}
pollution<- read.csv('/Users/Gustavo/GitRStudio/pollution_2000_2023.csv')
```



```{r}
pollution<- read.csv('/Users/Gustavo/GitRStudio/pollution_2000_2023.csv')

PH<-pollution %>%
  filter(City %in% c('Phoenix'))%>%
  arrange(desc(Date))
CO_mean_data<-numeric()
for (i in 2000:2023){
  PH_data<- PH %>%
    filter(year(Date)==i)
  CO_data<-c(mean(PH_data$CO.Mean))
  CO_mean_data<- c(CO_mean_data,CO_data)
}
CO_mean_data
```
